Label.name: $(parent)OrderName
Label.OnMouseEnter: -- Syntax: tcc_ShowOverlay(control, r, g, b, a, blockControl) --tccTestLabel:SetText(tccTestLabel:GetText() .. self:GetName() .. "\n") --tcc_ShowOverlay(self, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.25, false)

Button.name: $(parent)Menu
Button.OnClicked: local orderName = self:GetParent():GetNamedChild("Item"):GetNamedChild("OrderName"):GetText() ClearMenu() AddMenuItem("Delete this Item Order", function() tcc_DeleteSavedOrder(orderName) end) AddMenuItem("Load this Item Order", function() tcc_LoadSavedOrder(orderName) end) AddMenuItem("Replace this with the current Item Order", function() tcc_ReplaceSavedOrder(orderName) end) ShowMenu(self)

Button.name: tccBuilderTabButton
Button.OnMouseEnter: tcc_ShowTextTooltip(self, "Show the Item Builder / Item Order")

Button.name: tccFeedback
Button.OnMouseEnter: tcc_ShowTextTooltip(self, "Comments, questions, or concerns?\nSend feedback to @tinydog!")

Button.name: tccEsoPlusCheckbox
Button.OnMouseEnter: tcc_ShowTextTooltip(self, "ESO Plus membership adds 10% to all XP/Inspiration")

Button.name: tccOrcCraftsmanCheckbox
Button.OnMouseEnter: tcc_ShowTextTooltip(self, "The Craftsman Orcish racial skill adds 10% to Inspiration")

Button.name: tccCurrentCraftingSkillLevelButton
Button.OnMouseEnter: tcc_ShowTextTooltip(self, "Update with your current skill level and XP.")

Label.name: tccDesiredCraftingSkillLevelXpNeededLabel
Label.text: XP needed to reach desired skill level:

Button.name: tccTogglePassivesButton
Button.OnMouseEnter: tcc_ShowTextTooltip(self, "Show Passive Abilities for this Craft")

Label.name: tccXpCreateOrDeconLabel
Label.text: Will you be Creating or Deconstructing items?

Button.name: tccToggleImprovementSkillsButton
Button.OnMouseEnter: tcc_ShowTextTooltip(self, "Show or change the item improvement passive skill ranks used to calculate how many improvement materials are needed (Tempering Alloy, etc.)")

Label.name: tccImprovementSkillsSubtitle
Label.text: Choose the crafter's item improvement skill

Button.name: tccAddToOrder
Button.OnClicked: if tccItemSummary:GetText() ~= "" then tcc_AddItemToOrder(1, tcc.ItemBuilder) end

Button.name: $(parent)Mail
Button.OnMouseEnter: tcc_ShowTextTooltip(self, "Copy Order Summary to Mail\n(with RGB color codes)")

Label.name: tccTotalMaterialsCostLabel
Label.OnMouseEnter: tcc_ShowTextTooltip(self, "* Total market value of materials,\n based on the average prices reported\n by Master Merchant")

EditBox.name: tccAddSavedOrderName
EditBox.OnFocusLost: tcc_HideBorder(tccAddSavedOrder) -- Clear the border, if there was a save order error.
